attributes.contentHtml: Hey! I'm the highest rank / creator in MEHost. To protect our reputation me and dchu will be looking into this, hope you understand. We don't have any issues and this is not involved with us at the moment. If it get's worse please message me on discord, ping me in drama.gg discord or DM. About mehost managment, it's all dealt with. People have been promoted and demoted. Were trying out best to make a great host, were currently not having any profit and were partly in debt. I hope you understand or everyone understands what were going through on our end. It's a bit important to us to protect our reputation so i'm trying my best to protect it and making our host one of the best. ðŸ˜„
